scripts.bundle-cpp: just-scripts prepareBundle && react-native bundle --platform windows --entry-file index.windows.js --bundle-output windows/SampleAppCpp/Bundle/index.windows.bundle --assets-dest windows/SampleAppCpp/Bundle
scripts.bundle-cs: just-scripts prepareBundle && react-native bundle --platform windows --entry-file index.windows.js --bundle-output windows/SampleAppCS/Bundle/index.windows.bundle --assets-dest windows/SampleAppCS/Bundle
